name: Peter Spinaze's Final Odyssey: Theseus verses the Minotaur
description:
Plot of this game is based on the Greek Mythology and the story of Minotaur. The King of Minos imposed an annual tribute for 6 girls to be shipped to Crete and thrown as food to the hideous Minotaur who resides in a magical labyrinth. The player controls the character of Theseus who must kill the Minotaur and rescue all the imprisoned girls. On his way he will encounter onto many puzzles to solve and he will discover a lot of mysteries of the Labyrinth itself.

The Final Odyssey is the combination of action and adventure puzzler type of game. The main protagonist explores vast areas of the Labirynth that are divided onto several levels. He is armed with various weapons that helps him to neutralise enemies and dangers on his way. His way to kill the Minotaur is full of hazards like electric bolts, pits, spikes, shooting arrows that he needs to avoid. During his main quest the player will also interact with characters and embark on mini quests.
